name: tckconvert
description:
Convert between different track file formats.

The program currently supports MRtrix .tck files (input/output), ascii text files (input/output), VTK polydata files (input/output), and RenderMan RIB (export only).

Note that ascii files will be stored with one streamline per numbered file. To support this, the command will use the multi-file numbering syntax, where square brackets denote the position of the numbering for the files, for example:

$ tckconvert input.tck output-'[]'.txt

will produce files named output-0000.txt, output-0001.txt, output-0002.txt, ...

References:
author: Daan Christiaens (daan.christiaens@kcl.ac.uk), J-Donald Tournier (jdtournier@gmail.com), Philip Broser (philip.broser@me.com), Daniel Blezek (daniel.blezek@gmail.com).

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: the input track file.

inputs.name: output
inputs.description: the output track file.

inputs.name: scanner2voxel
inputs.description: if specified, the properties of this image will be used to convert track point positions from real (scanner) coordinates into voxel coordinates.

inputs.name: scanner2image
inputs.description: if specified, the properties of this image will be used to convert track point positions from real (scanner) coordinates into image coordinates (in mm).

inputs.name: voxel2scanner
inputs.description: if specified, the properties of this image will be used to convert track point positions from voxel coordinates into real (scanner) coordinates.

inputs.name: image2scanner
inputs.description: if specified, the properties of this image will be used to convert track point positions from image coordinates (in mm) into real (scanner) coordinates.

inputs.name: sides
inputs.description: number of sides for streamlines

inputs.name: increment
inputs.description: generate streamline points at every (increment) points

inputs.name: dec
inputs.description: add DEC as a primvar

inputs.name: radius
inputs.description: radius of the streamlines

inputs.name: ascii
inputs.description: write an ASCII VTK file (this is the default)

inputs.name: binary
inputs.description: write a binary VTK file

inputs.name: info
inputs.description: display information messages.

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: debug
inputs.description: display debugging messages.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: display version information and exit.
